  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_89436</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_89436</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Test de la présence dl'amidon dans une feuille de plante</string>
            <string language="en">Testing presence of starch in a plant leaf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfenvorhandensein der Stärke in einem 
Betriebsblatt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Presença testando do starch em uma folha da 
planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presenza difficile di amido in un foglio della 
pianta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξεταστική παρουσία αμύλου σε ένα φύλλο φυτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presencia de prueba del almidón en una hoja de 
la planta</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Quatrième dans une série de quatre illustrations  montrant une expérience pour tester la présence de l'amidon dans une feuille de plante. Montrée ici est le dépôt de la solution d'iode sur la feuille.</string>
            <string language="en">Fourth in a series of four illustrations showing an experiment to test the presence of starch in a plant leaf. Shown here is dropping of iodine solution on the leaf.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nourriture</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">solution d'iode</string>
            <string language="en">iodine solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">feuilles</string>
            <string language="en">leaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">amidon</string>
            <string language="en">starch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viertel in einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, die 
ein Experiment zeigen, um das Vorhandensein der Stärke in einem 
Betriebsblatt zu prüfen. Hier gezeigt das Fallen der Jodlösung
auf dem Blatt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fourth em uma série de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram uma experiência para testar a presença do starch em uma 
folha da planta. É mostrado aqui deixar cair da solução do 
iodo na folha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quarto in serie di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano un esperimento per verificare la presenza di amido in un 
foglio della pianta. È indicato qui cadere della soluzione 
dello iodio sul foglio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέταρτο σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν ένα πείραμα για να εξετάσει την παρουσία αμύλου σε 
ένα φύλλο φυτών. Εμφανισμένος εδώ μειώνεται της λύσης 
ιωδίου στο φύλλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuarto en una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran un experimento para probar la presencia del almidón en una 
hoja de la planta. Se muestra aquí el caer de la solución del 
yodo en la hoja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jodlösung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blätter</string>
          </keyword>
